page.title: 17ALICE STRUDWICK'S DAY,BRILL.
page.content: On Saturday I get up at 7am..I go into the bathroom and wash with my flannel. Afterwards I go and get dressed and wear things like jeans and a jumper.I go downstairs and get my own break- -fast like a bowl of cereal such as Rice Crispies or Weetabix and buttered toast made in the toaster.Then I go and clean my teeth with a toothbrush.After that i get ready to go to an iceskating rink with Alice Gregory and her family. We go to Oxford iceskating rink which is fairly new and quite cheap.When we come back I have lunch at home. Some- times we have people from the village to lunch so we have shepherds pie with vegetables and rhubarb for pudding. Then mummy washes the dishes and I dry them up.I go and play with Laura and we roll down hills on the common.It is by now 4pm.so I go to choir practice at the church.At 5pm.I go home for tea.
